name: Birthday Cake Maker Game
description:
Sure you like them, you are a kid who loves chocolate and fruit. And if you like cookies then of course you like and birthday parties where you can eat a very delicious cake.

If you want to help a child whose birthday is today you have to help us prepare a big and tasty cake. Through this chocolate cake cooking game you will be able to prove everybody that you are a great friend but also a very good cook that can make the best looking cakes ever !

Cake Maker allows you to create a cake for any occasion. If you want to make a cake for someone’s birthday, then Cake Maker Kids is the app for you.

Features:
-beautiful high quality HD graphics
-intuitive, easy to use interface
-infinite gameplay with unlimited combinations
-lots of toppings, candies, fruits, creams, candles, crumbs, marzipan
-figures and sound making toys for decoration
-screenshots can be saved in your photo gallery to show it to your friends

Let’s download a Cake Maker game now, a great game It free!
